result.execSummary:
The defendant Mark Antan Jaeger was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Rock County Ordinance - Property Damage. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.
  • Rock County Ordinance - Disorderly Conduct-DV. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: 2:13 PM Defendant Mark Antan Jaeger appeared by phone.  Attorney Kelly James Mattingly appeared by video for Mark Antan Jaeger.  Prosecuting attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Amended Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. No contest plea entered by Defendant on both counts; Court finds Defendant guilty. Court orders $100 fine on each count and one set of court costs.
Status conference on September 14, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
